text: Liang hai [de shuizhi] bu yiyang, zhege shi tian de, kekou de danshui, nage shi ku de xian shui. Nimen ke chi liang haizhong xinxian de rou [zhu][ru yu lei], nimen ke [cong liang haizhong] huoqu nimen suo chuandai de zhuangshi wu. Ni kanjian chuanbo zai haizhong polang hangxing [hangyun], yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen gan'en.
